about_the_game:
Escape The Void First Person is a single-player cooperative horror exploration game. In this game consisting of different levels, your only goal is to survive and find the exit. While doing this, you will need to use your logic, solve puzzles and take each step carefully. You must be alert to the dangers that await you around every corner. As the tension builds to a fever pitch, your heart will pound and adrenaline will course through your veins.

Realistic graphics: Step into another world with visuals that go beyond graphic quality realism and evoke emotion in every detail.

Intuitive User Interface: Instantly find what you are looking for and start enjoying it with a simple and easy-to-use interface that eliminates complexity.

Mysterious Atmosphere: Go on an exploration into the unknown with an atmosphere full of mystery, every corner of which arouses curiosity.

Unique Sound Design: Feel yourself right in the middle of the story with an unforgettable sound experience that complements every emotion and atmosphere.

Unlimited Exploration: Embark on an unlimited adventure with different worlds waiting to be discovered, with a new surprise around every corner.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains sudden reactionary actions and violent elements for fear purposes only.

name: Escape The Void 2024

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change in future updates.
